root_causes: Sub-questions are defined as numeric open-text fields (question_attributes include Numeric and OpenText) but the script only allows fixed answer codes (1..5) and special codes (97,98,99). It does not allow arbitrary numeric entries.
The script does not implement any numeric range/precision validation (UpperLimitType/LowerLimitType/Precision are present in expected logic but not enforced).
The script flags missing values as invalid (uses sel if miss(...) or ...). The expected logic sets NotRequired = true, so missing should be allowed and should not be flagged as invalid.
instructions: Do not treat these sub-questions as single-choice coded responses. Because question_attributes specify Numeric and OpenText, allow numeric entries (including decimals up to the specified precision) in addition to the special codes 97, 98, 99.

Remove or change the current missing-value check so that blank/missing responses are not selected as errors. Only select cases where a non-missing value is present but is neither a valid numeric within the allowed range nor one of the special codes.

Add numeric range and precision checks consistent with LowerLimitType and UpperLimitType. For example, for each HidA1ARPIS_n, use logic similar to: temporary. sel if isTest(). sel if (not miss(HidA1ARPIS_n) and not (any(HidA1ARPIS_n,97,98,99) or (HidA1ARPIS_n >= <lower> and HidA1ARPIS_n <= <upper> and RND(HidA1ARPIS_n, <precision>) = HidA1ARPIS_n))). list respid HidA1ARPIS_n. Replace <lower>, <upper>, and <precision> with the actual limits/precision required.

If no explicit numeric lower/upper bounds were provided in the spec, at minimum change the validation to: select only when a response is present and is neither a numeric value nor one of the special codes. Example: sel if isTest(). sel if (not miss(HidA1ARPIS_n) and not (any(HidA1ARPIS_n,97,98,99) OR number(HidA1ARPIS_n))). list respid HidA1ARPIS_n.

Keep the current variable names and the inclusion of special codes (97,98,99) but ensure the validation logic accepts either valid numeric input (with precision/range enforcement) or those special codes; do not flag missing responses given NotRequired=true.
